name: Sweet and sour Dill Pickles
author: Ryan Brock

ingredients.name: medium size cucumbers (to fill 4 qt. size jars)
c. salt (use good canning salt for best results)

instructions: Wash cucumbers and cut into chunks, enough to fill 4 quarts. To each jar add 3 or 4 slices of onion, 2 pieces of celery and 2 heads of dill. Dissolve sugar and salt in vinegar and water; bring to a boil. Place cucumbers in jars, then cover with hot sugar, salt, vinegar and water. Seal at once. For best results, do not use for 30 days. Makes 4 quarts.
